Name: MoveMMU
Author: Felix Gaisbauer
LongDescription: A move MMU realized using inverse kinematics. It moreover supports concurrent motions.
ShortDescription: A move MMU which models both, one handed and both handed motions.

Parameters.Name: TargetID
Parameters.Description: The id of the target location (object)

Parameters.Name: SubjectID
Parameters.Description: The id of the target location (object)

Parameters.Name: Hand
Parameters.Description: The hand of the carry motion

Parameters.Name: HoldDuration
Parameters.Description: An optional time, the move is holded.
